page.title: 16NORTH BRENT - SHOPPING
page.content: My five friends and I went to Kingsbury to look round and do some shopping. First we stopped by Lloyds Bank to get some cash. Our next stop was a fashion shop for some clothes. Between us we bought bangles, a ski-suit, trousers and a jacket. We spent about Â£50. Then we visited the Wimpy for a take-away meal. We each had the same: beefburger in a bun with relish,lettuce, tomato sauce and a coke to drink. Our next stop was the pet shop to buy a hamster and some rabbit food. At the Candybox (sweetshop) we bought 7 Shushpuppies (iced drinks) - 2 for Caroline; chocolate and crisps. After looking around for a bit more we caught the 183 bus home. A good day was had by all.
